For the tomato and herb salsa: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the cheese on toast, toast the bread in the oven for 3-4 minutes, or until lightly golden. Lay the slices of cheese on top of the toast then grill for 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbling.
For the tomato and herb salsa, combine all of the salsa ingredients together in a bowl and mix well to combine.
To serve, place the cheese on toast on a serving plate and spoon over the tomato and herb salsa.
title: Taleggio cheese on toast with a tomato and herb salsa
